sense.name: move towards
sense.examples: Syphilisanother spirochetal infection gravitates to the brain. Watch the kids who everybody gravitates around. Furthermore, the locus of activity is gravitating to the regional level. That's stuff that gravitates a lot like atoms. The stars gravitate towards each other. The conversation gravitated towards politics.

sense.name: be attracted to
sense.examples: He gravitates directly to poetry. Aaron, 7, gravitates towards video games when he's alone. He gravitates toward pastels because they are direct and are available. I think that the mind naturally gravitates towards numbers. Boys gravitate towards girls at that age.
